description:
This presentation was recorded at GOTO Amsterdam 2016
http://gotoams.nl

Jonathan Sprinkle - Distinguished Associate Prof. of Electrical & Computer Engineering at the University of Arizona

ABSTRACT
A computer controlling your car is easy to imagine, but how about a computer saving you money on your energy bills, and helping you predict the impact of your lifestyle changes? The Internet of Things gives us unprecedented access to data from physical objects, but how to [...]
Download slides and read the full abstract here:
http://gotocon.com/amsterdam-2016/presentation/Morning%20Keynote:%20Self-Driving%20Cars

title: GOTO 2016 • Self-Driving Cars • Jonathan Sprinkle
